subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carlos Boozer, who had been averaging 11.4 points in the series, scored 23 and Chicago’s defense limited Atlanta to 36 percent shooting as the Bulls advanced to the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Carlos Boozer, who had been averaging 11.4 points in the series, scored 23 and Chicago’s defense limited Atlanta to 36 percent shooting as the Bulls advanced to the Eastern Conference finals.
